name: Mike
line: Is there a number we can call for your parents?

name: Unknown
line: Where's your hair? Do you have cancer?

name: Unknown
line: Are you in some kind of trouble?

name: Unknown
line: Stop it! You're freaking her out!

name: Mike
line: All right, that's enough, all right? She's just scared and cold.

name: Dustin
line: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.

name: Mike
line: See over there? That's the bathroom. Privacy. Get it?

name: Mike
line: Oh, so you can speak. Okay, well... Um, how about we just keep the door just like this. Is that better?

name: Lucas
line: She said 'no' and 'yes.' Your three-year-old sister says more.

name: Lucas
line: There's something seriously wrong with her. Like, wrong in the head.

name: Dustin
line: I bet she escaped from Pennhurst.

name: Lucas
line: You got a lot of family there?

name: Lucas
line: Seriously though, think about it. That would explain her shaved hair and why she's so crazy.

name: Dustin
line: She's an escapee is the point. She's probably a psycho.

name: Mike
line: We should've never brought her here.

name: Lucas
line: So you just wanted to leave her out in that storm?

name: Dustin
line: Yes! We went out to find Will, not another problem.

name: Lucas
line: I think we should tell your mom.

name: Mike
line: 'Cause, we weren't supposed to be out tonight, remember? So if I tell my mom and she tells your mom and your mom... Our houses become Alcatraz.

name: Mike
line: All right, here's the plan. She sleeps here tonight. In the morning, she sneaks around my house, goes to the front door and rings my doorbell. My mom will answer and know exactly what to do. She'll send her back to Pennhurst or wherever she comes from. We'll be totally in the clear. And tomorrow night, we go back out. And this time, we find Will.

name: Mike
line: Here you go. This is my sleeping bag.

name: Lucas
line: Wouldn't want her in my house.

name: Mike
line: Hey, um, I never asked your name. Is that real? Sorry, I've just never seen a kid with a tattoo before. What's it mean? Eleven? That's your name? Eleven. Okay. Um, well, my name's Mike. Short for Michael. Maybe we can call you 'El.' Short for Eleven. Um, well, okay. 'Night, El.

name: Jonathan
line: All right, Mom. Breakfast is ready.

name: Joyce
line: What? No, be careful of the poster.

name: Jonathan
line: I just need you to eat, Mom.

name: Joyce
line: Listen. Listen, the Xerox place opens in, like, 30 minutes. And I don't want you to go alone so I'm gonna have Karen take you, 'cause I should be here.

name: Jonathan
line: No, I know. I told you, I got it.

name: Joyce
line: We need to make, what, 200, 300 copies?

name: Jonathan
line: Okay, Mom. Mom. Mom! You can't get like this, okay?

name: Joyce
line: I know. I came as soon as I could.

name: Joyce
line: A little bit of trust here, all right? We've been searching all night. Went all the way to Cartersville.

name: Joyce
line: Flo says you got a phone call?

name: Joyce
line: You're saying that that's not weird?

name: Joyce
line: Can we, like, trace who made the call? Contact the...

name: Hopper
line: No, it doesn't work like that. Now, uh, you're sure it was Will? Because Flo said you just heard some breathing.

name: Joyce
line: No. It was him. It was Will. And he was scared. And then something...

name: Hopper
line: It was probably just a prank call. It was somebody trying to scare you.

name: Hopper
line: Well, this thing's been on TV. It brings out all the crazies, you know. False leads, prank calls, uh...

name: Joyce
line: No, Hopper, it was not a prank. It was him.

name: Joyce
line: Come on, how about a little trust here? What, you think I'm making this up?

name: Hopper
line: I'm not saying that you're making it up. All I'm saying is it's an emotional time for you.

name: Joyce
line: And you think I don't know my own son's breathing? Wouldn't you know your own daughter's?

name: Hopper
line: You hear from, uh, Lonnie yet?

name: Hopper
line: It's been long enough. I'm having him checked out.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, come on! You're wasting your time.

name: Joyce
line: Hey, Hopper. Hopper. Let me go.

name: Joyce
line: To Lonnie's. You know, if Will's there, it means he ran away. And if he sees the cops, he'll think he's in trouble. He'll hide. You know, he's good at hiding.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah? Well, cops are good at finding. Okay? Stay here with your mom. She needs you.

name: Mike
line: Do a lot of studying last night?

name: Mike
line: What was your test on again? Human anatomy?

name: Mike
line: Hey, you found my supercomm. Pretty cool, huh? I talk to my friends with it. Mostly Lucas, 'cause he lives so close. Signal's pretty weak.

name: Mike
line: Got you breakfast. So listen, this is gonna sound a little weird, but I just need you to go out there. Then go to the front door and ring the doorbell. My mom will answer and you'll tell her that you're lost and that you need help. But whatever you do, you can't tell her about last night or that you know me. Understand? Really, it's no big deal. We'll just pretend to meet each other again. And my mom, she'll know who to call.

name: Mike
line: No? No you don't want my mom to get help?

name: Mike
line: You're in trouble, aren't you? Who are you in trouble with?

name: Mike
line: Bad? Bad people? They want to hurt you? The bad people? Understand?

name: Karen
line: Michael, where are you? We're going to be late. Let's go!

name: Mike
line: All right, I'll be back. Just stay here, okay? Stay here.

name: Unknown
line: Last night. Less than two miles away.

name: Joyce
line: It was my son. I know it. And I heard something else.

name: Joyce
line: It was like, uh, some kind of animal. I don't know. Just please tell Hop to hurry.

name: Hopper
line: No, nothing but a dead phone.

name: Hopper
line: About one step from falling off the edge.

name: Callahan
line: She's been a few steps for a while now, hasn't she?

name: Hopper
line: Kid's missing, man. Show a little class.

name: Callahan
line: All right. Come on, let's go! We got a lot of ground to cover.

name: Powell
line: The chief and her, they've screwed before, huh?

name: Unknown
line: When alpha particles go through gold foil, they become...

name: Steve
line: I don't know, I think you've studied enough, Nance.

name: Steve
line: I'm telling you, you know, you got this. Don't worry. Now, on to more important matters. My dad has left town on a conference and my mom's gone with him, 'cause, you know, she doesn't trust him.

name: Steve
line: Come on. It'll be low key. It'll just be us. What do you say? Are you in or are you out?

name: Tommy
line: How much you want to bet he killed him?

name: Nancy
line: Hey. I just wanted to say, you know, um... I'm sorry about everything. Everyone's thinking about you. It sucks.

name: Nancy
line: I'm sure he's fine. He's a smart kid.

name: Nancy
line: I have to go. Chemistry test.

name: Principal
line: Attention, faculty and students. At 8:00 p.m. tonight, there will be an assembly on the football field in support of Will Byers and his family. All are encouraged to attend. Volunteer sign-ups for search parties are still available in the office.

name: Dustin
line: I'm telling you, his stupid plan failed.

name: Lucas
line: I thought you liked his plan.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, but obviously it was stupid, or he'd be here.

name: Lucas
line: If his mom found out a girl spent the night...

name: Dustin
line: He's in deep shit right about now.

name: Lucas
line: Hey, what if she slept naked?

name: Lucas
line: Oh, if Mrs. Wheeler tells my parents...

name: Dustin
line: No way. Mike would never rat us out.

name: Dustin
line: All that matters is, after school, the freak will be back in the loony bin, and we can focus on what really matters, finding Will.

name: Mike
line: You want anything to drink? We have OJ, skim milk... What else? Um, we have... Oh, this is my living room. It's mostly just for watching TV. Nice, right? It's a 22-inch. That's, like, ten times bigger than Dustin's.

name: Mike
line: I guess. That's my sister Nancy. And that's baby Holly. And those are my parents. What are your parents like? Do they live close?

name: Mike
line: That's our La-Z-Boy. It's where my dad sleeps. You can try it if you want.

name: Mike
line: It's fun. Just trust me, okay? See? Fun, right? Now you try.

name: Jonathan
line: All right, you can keep the mix if you want.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, really. All the best stuff's on there. Joy Division, Bowie, Television, The Smiths... It'll totally change your life.

name: Joyce
line: Where the hell are you, Lonnie? I don't want to hear it. I don't want to hear it. This is ridiculous! I'm so sick of your excuses.

name: Will
line: It's fun to go with him sometimes.

name: Jonathan
line: Come on. Has he ever done anything with you that you actually like? You know, like the arcade or something?

name: Jonathan
line: No, all right? He hasn't. He's trying to force you to like normal things. And you shouldn't like things because people tell you you're supposed to. Okay? Especially not him.

name: Jonathan
line: But you like The Clash? For real?

name: Donald
line: Joyce, I wasn't expecting you today.

name: Joyce
line: I brought Jeffrey in to cover. I'm not here to work. The storm last night, I need a new phone.

name: Joyce
line: Uh, yeah, you know, uh... I gave Jonathan all my money for the copies for the posters. Uh, I need an advance.

name: Donald
line: Yeah, uh, I was thinking, two weeks?

name: Joyce
line: Yes, I understand, but, you know, I have to pay Jeffrey for covering... Donald. I've been here ten years, right? Have I ever called in sick or missed a shift once? I've worked, uh, Christmas Eve and Thanksgiving. I don't know where my boy is. He's gone. I don't know if I'm gonna ever see him again, if he's hurt... I need this phone and two weeks' advance. And a pack of Camels.

name: Mike
line: Ready are you? What knows you of ready? His name's Yoda. He can use the Force to move things with his mind, like this. Whoosh! Oh, this is my dinosaur, Rory. Look, he has a speaker in his mouth so he can roar. Oh, these are all my science fair trophies. We got first every year. Except for last year when we got third. Mr. Clarke said it was totally political.

name: Mike
line: You know Will? Did you see him? Last night? On the road?

name: Karen
line: Mike? What are you doing home?

name: Mike
line: One second! In here. I'll be right back, okay? Please, you have to get in, or my mom, she'll find you. Do you understand? I won't tell her about you. I promise.

name: Mike
line: It means something that you can't break. Ever.

name: Eleven
line: Pop! Papa! Papa! No! Papa! No! No! Papa! Papa! Papa! Papa! Papa!

name: Mike
line: I just... I don't feel good. I woke up and my head, it really hurt bad, and my throat was all scratchy, and I wanted to tell you, but the last time I told you I was sick you made me go to school anyway, and...

name: Karen
line: No, of course not. All this that's been going on with Will, I can't imagine what it's been like for you. I just... I want you to feel like you can talk to me. I never want you to feel like you have to hide anything from me. I'm here for you. Okay?

name: Mike
line: Is everything okay? Are you sure?

name: Hopper
line: Whoa, whoa. Careful, careful. I need you alive for the next few days, at least.

name: Callahan
line: Oh, hell, I could survive that.

name: Callahan
line: George Burness made the jump. And he was drunk as a skunk. He did it on a $10 bet.

name: Hopper
line: George is a liar. You make that jump from this height, that water turns into cement. Hits you like a ton of bricks. Break every damn bone in your body.

name: Florence
line: Hey, Chief, we got a call from over at Benny's. I think you need to get there right away.

name: Callahan
line: Missing kid, suicide... You must feel like a big city cop again, huh, Chief?

name: Hopper
line: Well, I mostly dealt with strangers back then. Benny was my friend.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, he's out back. What do you want?

name: Hopper
line: Hey, what do you think you're doing? Hey!

name: Jonathan
line: Hey, Will? Will! Will, you here? Will!

name: Cynthia
line: Will someone please explain what the hell is going on?

name: Lonnie
line: Jonathan, Cynthia. Cynthia, this is Jonathan. My oldest.

name: Mike
line: Are you out of your mind?

name: Mike
line: You are out of your mind!

name: Mike
line: What do you mean she knows about Will?

name: Lucas
line: She pointed at him, at his picture. She knew he was missing. I could tell.

name: Lucas
line: Just think about it. Do you really think it was a coincidence that we found her on Mirkwood, the same place where Will disappeared? And she said bad people are after her. I think maybe these bad people are the same ones that took Will. I think she knows what happened to him.

name: Mike
line: Then why doesn't she tell us? Do you know where he is? Do you know where Will is?

name: Mike
line: She should be scared! If you know where he is, tell us!

name: Dustin
line: This is nuts. We have to take her to your mom.

name: Mike
line: No! Eleven said telling any adult would put us in danger.

name: Lucas
line: No, no, no! We're going back to plan A. We're telling your mom.

name: Lonnie
line: Take a look at this beaut. Should've seen it when I got it. Took me a year, but it's almost done.

name: Jonathan
line: Really? You want to check up my ass, too?

name: Lonnie
line: I told you the same thing as I told those cops, he's not here and he never has been.

name: Jonathan
line: Then why didn't you call Mom back?

name: Lonnie
line: I don't know, I just assumed she just forgot where he was. You know, he was lost or something. That boy never was very good at taking care of himself.

name: Jonathan
line: This isn't some joke, all right? There are search parties, reporters...

name: Lonnie
line: Hopper's not still chief, is he? Tell your mother she's gotta get you out of that hellhole. Come out here to the city. People are more real here, you know? And then I could see you more.

name: Jonathan
line: What, you think I don't want to see you?

name: Lonnie
line: I know you don't. See, that's your mother talkin' right there.

name: Lonnie
line: Oh, great. So one kid goes missing, the other one runs wild? Some real fine parenting right there.

name: Jonathan
line: Look, all I'm saying is, maybe I'm not the asshole, all right?

name: Jonathan
line: In case you forgot what he looks like.

name: Cynthia
line: He's kinda cute, hmm? Maybe I'll trade you in for the younger model?

name: Earl
line: Just doesn't make any sense, Chief.

name: Hopper
line: You, uh, notice anything odd about him the last few weeks?

name: Earl
line: No, we're fixin' to go fishing down the Etowah next Sunday. I mean, he was lookin' forward to it. I know that.

name: Hopper
line: He got any enemies you might know about? I mean, people who might not want him around?

name: Earl
line: The exes didn't like him much. That's for sure, but nah.

name: Hopper
line: When was the last time you saw him?

name: Hopper
line: Well, there was this, uh, this kid.

name: Hopper
line: Kid? What are you talking about?

name: Earl
line: Yeah. At lunch, uh, there was this boy that, uh... I mean, he was trying to steal food out of Benny's kitchen. Can you imagine that?

name: Hopper
line: This kid... what'd he look like?

name: Earl
line: Well, he was about yea high. You know, tiny like. I didn't get a good look at him, though. He was back in the kitchen.

name: Earl
line: Oh, no, that's Lonnie's missin' kid. No. This was a different kid. This one had really short hair. I mean, it was buzzed nearly down to the scalp.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, well, let's... You know, let's forget about the haircut. I mean, if this kid had a buzz cut could it be Lonnie's kid?

name: Earl
line: Well, I didn't get a good look at him. About the right height, though. I mean, could've been. Yeah, that's could've been.

name: Nancy
line: Because I don't want to go by myself.

name: Barbara
line: Barb, it's not rocket science. You just tell your parents you're gonna stay at my place afterwards.

name: Nancy
line: Coming! Look, I gotta go. I'll see you in an hour.

name: Ted
line: Oh, no, I had two bologna sandwiches for lunch. I don't know why.

name: Nancy
line: So, there's this special assembly thing tonight for Will at the school field. Barb's driving.

name: Karen
line: Why am I just hearing about this?

name: Karen
line: I told you, I don't want you out after dark until Will is found.

name: Nancy
line: I know, I know, but it'd be super weird if I'm not there. I mean, everyone's going.

name: Nancy
line: Why don't you take the boys, too?

name: Karen
line: Don't you think you should be there? For Will?

name: Karen
line: It's okay, Holly. It's just a loud noise.

name: Callahan
line: Hey, you think Earl really saw Will? I mean, what's he doin' with a shaved head? And stealing food from Benny?

name: Hopper
line: Tell you what, when we find him, we'll ask.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Not sure. Maybe nothing. I found this. In there.

name: Powell
line: No way a kid crawls through there.

name: Hopper
line: I don't know a scared enough one might. His brother said he was good at hiding.

name: Mike
line: No adults. Just us and some meatloaf.

name: Mike
line: Don't worry. They won't tell anyone about you. They promise. Right?

name: Dustin
line: We never would've upset you if we knew you had superpowers.

name: Mike
line: What Dustin is trying to say is that they were just scared earlier. That's all.

name: Lucas
line: We just wanted to find our friend.

name: Mike
line: Um, a friend is someone that you'd do anything for. You lend them your cool stuff, like comic books and trading cards. And they never break a promise.

name: Lucas
line: A spit swear means you never break your word. It's a bond.

name: Mike
line: That's super important, because friends they tell each other things. Things that parents don't know.

name: Barbara
line: What are we doing here? His house is three blocks away.

name: Nancy
line: We can't park in the driveway.

name: Barbara
line: This is so stupid. I'm just gonna drop you off.

name: Nancy
line: Calm down, Barb. Come on. You promised that you'd go. You're coming. We're gonna have a great time.

name: Barbara
line: He just wants to get in your pants.

name: Barbara
line: Nance seriously. He invited you to his house. His parents aren't home. Come on, you are not this stupid.

name: Nancy
line: Tommy H. And Carol are gonna be there.

name: Barbara
line: Tommy and Carol have been having sex since, like, seventh grade. It'll probably just be, like, a big orgy.

name: Nancy
line: All right, well you can be, like, my guardian. All right? Make sure I don't get drunk and do anything stupid.

name: Sandra
line: You ever feel cursed? You know, the last person to go missing here was in, uh the summer of '23. The last suicide was the fall of '61.

name: Hopper
line: When'd the last person freeze to death?

name: Hopper
line: Warm me up. Just give me a minute out here.

name: Mike
line: Did you see him? On Mirkwood? Do you know where he is?

name: Mike
line: Will is hiding? From the bad men?

name: Joyce
line: Hello? Hello. Who is this? Will? Will, it's me. Talk to me. I'm here. Just tell me where you are, honey. I can hear you. Please.

name: Joyce
line: Will! Yes, it's me. It's me. Where are you? Where are you? Just talk to me...

name: Joyce
line: Oh, no, no! No! No! No! Oh, no! No, no...

name: Joyce
line: What Will Will, is that you?

name: Steve
line: Is that supposed to impress me?

name: Steve
line: You are a cliché, you do realize that?

name: Nancy
line: You are a cliché. What with your your grades and your band practice.

name: Nancy
line: Okay, party girl. Why don't you just, uh, show us how it's done, then?

name: Steve
line: You gotta make a little hole right in I got it.

name: Barbara
line: What? No. No, I don't want to. Thanks.

name: Nancy
line: It's fun! Just give it a Nance Just Just give it a shot.

name: Steve
line: Oh, it's uh, down past the kitchen, to the left.

name: Nancy
line: Oh, my, God! What the hell, Tommy?

name: Barbara
line: Nance! Nancy. Where are you going?

name: Nancy
line: Nowhere. Just upstairs. To change. I fell in the pool. Why don't you go ahead and go home. I'll just I'll get a ride or something.

name: Nancy
line: I'm fine. Just go ahead and go home, okay?

name: Carol
line: Hmm well, I hear his mom's room has a fireplace.

name: Steve
line: Are you kidding? Okay, well, you know, you are cleaning the sheets.

name: Steve
line: Yeah. Yeah? Come on, let's get you some dry clothes.
